elements.caption: The Resident Status Tile graphically represents the presence status of up to 5 residents.

Up to 5 residents can be configured. Non-configured residents will be hidden. (Optional) Photos must be created as media objects. Photos should have an aspect ratio of 1:1. If a resident is absent, the photo will be displayed in grayscale. Present residents in color.
Je Bewohner wird eine Bool-Variable ben√∂tigt. (true = anwesend, false = abwesend)

items.caption: Transparency value for the image (values from 0 to 1)
